channel.title: I want to make kicksecure easier to use.
channel.description:
I have installed Kicksecure-xfce on Debian. I like it very much, but there are some inconveniences.
・I can't click on the touchpad with a tap ・I can't see how much battery life I have. ・I can't change the brightness with the keyboard ・There is no graphical user interface for the networkmanager.
Please tell me how to solve these problems.

item.title: I want to make kicksecure easier to use.
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
You can research these questions same as if you were using Debian. See https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle

Read full topic
item.source: I want to make kicksecure easier to use.

item.title: I want to make kicksecure easier to use.
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
warenoakaunto:

I have installed Kicksecure-xfce on Debian. I like it very much, but there are some inconveniences.

you mean you build it or installed it inside hypervisor (vbox,kvm) inside debian?

warenoakaunto:

Please tell me how to solve these problems.

if you have installed it inside VM its still not yet ready for daily use, just there for testing. So wait for upgrade on this later.

Read full topic
